Annex 3. Nutrition Programme Case Studies
Senegal
Community Nutrition Programme (CNP) (1995–2001)
The Senegal CNP was implemented from 1995 to 2001 in poor urban and peri-urban areas. 
Activities were coordinated by the NGO Agence d’Exécution des Travaux d’Intérêt Public 
contre le sous-emploi (AGETI
